name: fullstack-secure-auth-system
description: Fullstack Secure Authentication System with NestJS, React, TypeScript, and MongoDB
author: Mohammed Nasif <m.khaled100@ymail.com>

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:3000/health && npm --workspace frontend run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c yellow,cyan "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace backend && npm run build --workspace frontend
scripts.start: npm run start --workspace backend && npm run preview --workspace frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace backend && npm run test --workspace frontend
